description: Starts a column statistics task run, for a specified table and columns.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database where the table resides.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the table to generate statistics.

parameters.name: ColumnNameList
parameters.description: A list of the column names to generate statistics. If none is supplied, all column names for the table will be used by default. (string) ---

parameters.name: Role
parameters.description: The IAM role that the service assumes to generate statistics.

nested_items.name: ColumnStatisticsTaskRunId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the column statistics task run.
